Evanston.People's Music School: Founded in 1976, The People's Music School offers free group classes and private lessons to children and adults, regardless of their financial resources. People's Music School is located in Uptown, Chicago at 931 W. Eastwood Avenue. The School today offers instruction in 13 instruments (including woodwind, piano, percussion, and string instruments), as well as voice and theory classes to more than 350 students each year.
